text: Richard Basehart was an American actor. He played Admiral Harriman Nelson in the television series Voyage To The Bottom Of The Sea. He played Ishmael in the 1956 movie Moby Dick. On September 17, 1984 Richard Basehart died from a stroke. He was 70 year old. title: Richard Basehart
